title: Remote Education Library Service Operation Strategies Utilizing Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic library services and experience in operating secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: Emphasis on smartphone-based tools in limited-technology environments, fostering practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of designing remote education library services in a collaborative learning environment
Learners can propose practical library operation plans by establishing a collaborative system with diverse stakeholders
Learners can develop strategies for operating smartphone-based library services with limited technological resources

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
